to the other fin see photos c with single_crochet this is the first single_crochet of the round r 1 single_crochet 4 increase x2 single_crochet 4 decrease 13 place marker on decrease st single_crochet into the first single_crochet st to connect the round see photos d this is the first single_crochet of the next round before continuing we will add the wire for the tail and finish stuffing with fiberfill take your wire and measure it against the tail that you ve made so far however far down the shaft of the tail still needs stuffing is how long to make the wire for that section of tail see photos left <- using the current tail fin for reference i twisted the wire into bunny ears in the necessary length for the tail fins don t make the wire too long then i twisted the wire together at the bottom to make the wire into the shape of a y now we will insert the wire into the tail see photos on page 9 bend down one branch of the wire then taking the tail of the reaper fold the tail fin down so it s parallel with the shaft of the tail insert 8 copyright mysimplicitiesbymn all rights reserved all documents and pictures in said documents are property of megan nelson mysimplicitiesbymn
